name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. House of Representatives ended its "China Week" on Monday with the passage of a series of bills aimed at addressing various threats from the Chinese Communist Party. These bills cover a variety of areas, including biosecurity, drones, agriculture, and battery dependence. Many companies are involved, including BGI, WuXi Biologics, WuXi AppTec, DJI, Guoxuan High-tech, BYD, Envision Technology, CATL, EVE Energy, and Haichen Energy Storage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a game anchor covered the game interface with a picture before entering the game in order to prevent sensitive IDs from appearing in the live broadcast.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest engineering textbook "Fundamentals of Engineering Materials and Mechanical Manufacturing" published by Peking University Press has begun to incorporate ideological and political content.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of the 13th, the Education, Culture and Sports Bureau of Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone issued a notice on the distribution of student meal ingredients at the East Campus of Jingkai Foreign Languages School: Starting from breakfast on September 13, the original food distribution company of the East Campus of Jingkai Foreign Languages School will be temporarily suspended, and another supplier with corresponding qualifications will be selected to deliver the ingredients.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, at the Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone Foreign Language School, a catering company smuggled banned ingredients in the middle of the night. After the parents discovered this, they surrounded the school gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, when some netizens used the domestic AI Wenxin Yiyan to search, the AI directly pushed links to pornography and adult products.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, a netizen reported that if he sent the word "retire" to the CCTV News official account, the account would automatically reply with a photo of Ganyu police officers. As of now, sending the word "retire" will no longer receive a photo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, the Ministry of Finance imposed the maximum penalty on PricewaterhouseCoopers for its illegal gains in the Evergrande Real Estate audit project, and imposed a severe penalty of suspending its business for 6 months on PricewaterhouseCoopers, which bore the main responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: American rapper Kanye will arrive in Haikou for a performance. Many Xinjiang Uyghur netizens reported that their tickets were refunded without reason by the platform before the concert started, and some fans have even arrived in Haikou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 14, Guangdong University of Technology. The Internet revealed that the school leaders frequently made golden sentences during the military training speech, "You dare to betray even the color of your ancestors", "Why is your hair color the same as Trump's", "You don't believe in Yanhuang but Trump, and Trump has a younger son who is even less reliable"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, the Ahu High Frequency Processing Factory in Ruian, Wenzhou, owed migrant workers half a year's wages. The migrant workers held up banners to demand their wages and were forcibly taken away by the police and a large number of armed police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a netizen’s contribution, a school recently asked parents to download and register the “Digital RMB” APP, and give priority to the use of digital RMB in various online and offline payment scenarios.
